data.persona: I am a spider. I am large, black, and have eight hairy legs. I wait to trap insects in my web. I enjoy eating unwary prey. I live in a darkened wood near a remote village.
data.description:
You are in the The ritual room.
A room with a solid block stone in the middle with steps leading up to it. Candle stands surround the center with 4 candle holders on each stand. A red carpet leads to the steps to the center of the room.
There's a Candle, a red carpet, and a holder here.
The peasant and the member are here.

You are carrying nothing.
